0.1.description:
THIS PLUGIN IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND HAS NO WORKING FUNCTIONALITY. CHECK BACK JANUARY 2012.

UMatter2Us turns WordPress into a web-based learning management system (LMS).
The primary motivation behind this effort is the perceived deficiency of existing tools, e.g. Blackboard, for the effective creation of a learner-centered classroom environment.

The name of the system is a double entendre:

  • You Matter to Us
    This interpretation acknowledges the social constructivist pedagogy that underlies the system. The system is designed to foster a learning community in which all members work to help others have rich, meaningful learning experiences.
